snippet: Colts owner Jim Irsay and Peyton Manning held a news conference on Wednesday to announce that Manning will look for another team to play quarterback for in 2012.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay and quarterback Peyton Manning hold a news conference to announce Manning's release from the Colts.
lead_paragraph: Colts owner Jim Irsay and Peyton Manning held a news conference on Wednesday to announce that Manning will look for another team to play quarterback for in 2012.

headline.seo: For Peyton Manning and Colts, an Emotional Farewell
headline.main: After an Emotional Farewell, Manning and the Colts Look to Move On
headline.print_headline: After Emotional Farewell, Manning and the Colts Look to Move On
